attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Abolish Home Information Packs when selling a house. Due to the governments unfair policy, whereby, if you take your house of the market due to financial reasons or personal reasons you still have to pay ridiculous amounts in fees. When the searches are done via the computer, it is not worth the money you end up paying. The HIP should be done on the bases of; if a sell of the house is completed then HIP should be then paid at a fair price. This should be related to the amount of actual hours of labour spent collecting the information.
